case.title: Are you a decent, sweet muslim girl? - 25 (London)
case.text:
Hi,
I know this is probably a weird place to look for a person however I am trying my luck here as I have had too many bad experiences. I am looking to simply make a connection with a muslim girl, I am respectful and not like most guys out there, you will realise this very soon after speaking to me. Will reply with more info about myself once I get a genuine reply from you. Tell me where about's your from, your interests? I am educated and hold down a decent job.
Thanks for reading.
